welcome_message_body: Welcome to Oaxaca, a city known for its rich culture, delicious cuisine, and vibrant arts scene. We hope you enjoy exploring its charming streets and experiencing all that this beautiful city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Catedral Restaurante & Bar (Restaurante Catedral)
restaurants.description: Catedral Restaurante & Bar (Restaurante Catedral) is a mexican restaurant located in Oaxaca de Juárez.
restaurants.address: García Vigil 105 (Esquina Av. Morelos), 68000 Oaxaca de Juárez, Oaxaca

restaurants.name: Carniceria El Torito
restaurants.description: Carniceria El Torito is a steakhouse located in Oaxaca de Juárez.
restaurants.address: 20 De noviembre 28, Oaxaca de Juárez, Oaxaca

restaurants.name: Boulenc
restaurants.description: Boulenc is a breakfast spot located in Oaxaca de Juárez.
restaurants.address: C. Porfirio Díaz 207, 68000 Oaxaca de Juárez, Oaxaca

restaurants.name: Mercado 20 de Noviembre
restaurants.description: Mercado 20 de Noviembre is a food court located in Oaxaca de Juárez.
restaurants.address: Calle Mina S/N (e/ Calles 20 de Noviembre y Miguel Cabrera), 68000 Oaxaca de Juárez, Oaxaca

restaurants.name: Levadura De Olla
restaurants.description: Levadura De Olla is a mexican restaurant located in Centro.
restaurants.address: Calle de Manuel García Vigil 304, 68000 Centro, Oaxaca
